Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.11976121] Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli DH5α (MIC=160 µM, IC50>80 µM);Fungi:Penicillium digitatum PHI-26 (MIC=20 µM, IC50=11 ± 1 µM), Penicillium italicum PHI-1 (MIC=40 µM,  IC50=22 ± 3 µM), Botrytis cinerea CECT2100 (MIC=60 µM, IC50=38 ± 24 µM), Fusarium oxysporum CECT2866 (MIC=80 µM, IC50=45 ± 4 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: In general, positively charged residues (arginine or lysine) and residues with aromatic rings (tryptophan or phenylalanine) rendered antifungal activity.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial against Gram-negative bacterium. The antifungal mixture is also antibacterial, with a predominance of basic and aromatic residues.

Literature.Title: Identification of novel hexapeptides bioactive against phytopathogenic fungi through screening of a synthetic peptide combinatorial library.
Literature.Author: López-García B, Pérez-Payá E, Marcos JF.
